title: Artisanal data collection methods: Hand crafting surveys for investigative journalism
description: This text discusses the use of surveys as a method of data collection in investigative journalism. It provides insights into the process of designing, conducting, and analyzing surveys, as well as the lessons learned from specific survey projects. The authors, Nicole Hayden, Emily Featherston, and Kate Martin, share their experiences and expertise in using surveys to tell stories and gather information.
